speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Sarah from XYZ Collections. Am I speaking with Mark?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is Mark. What can I help you with?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling regarding your outstanding balance with ABC Credit. Can I confirm your account details?

speaker: Customer
text: Sure, I’d like to know the balance first.

speaker: Agent
text: You currently have a balance of $450. How would you like to proceed with payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I wasn’t expecting that. Can you remind me when it was due?

speaker: Agent
text: The payment was due last month on the 15th. Would you like to discuss payment options?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay part of it now. Can you take my credit card info?

speaker: Agent
text: Absolutely, but first I need to verify your identity. Could you please provide your address?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Mark. That matches our records. Let’s proceed with collecting your payment.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that. I will process this payment for you now.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! You're all set. Have a great day!
